msContents.summary: Census list giving names and ages of individuals as well as their parents'names

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; back blank
Col. I, 37 lines, col. II, 35 lines, col. III 30 line; broken at both sides
The hand is a rapid cursive and is similar to that of P.Princ. I, 1-6

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col.
